mcq.statement: What was the main provision of the Liaquat-Nehru Pact (Delhi Pact) of 1950 regarding refugees?

options.a: Refugees were not allowed to return
options.b: Refugees could return to dispose of property, abducted women were to be returned, and forced conversions were to be prevented
options.c: Only abducted women were to be returned

mcq.one_liner: The Liaquat-Nehru Pact of 1950 allowed **refugees to return to dispose of their property and ensured the return of abducted women and prevention of forced conversions**.
